title.value: Download and Read the Labdoo School Hub Booklet

body.value:
If you are planning on creating a Labdoo Hub at your school or if you are already managing one, the 'Labdoo School Hub Booklet' will provide you help and guidance through the process. Alternatively, if you are a parent or a student and would like to pitch the idea of creating a Labdoo hub at your school, you can also download and use the booklet guide to present your proposal to the school director.
[Download in printable format - English Edition] [Download in printable format - Catalan Edition]
